body_content.explanation: a track consisting of turns and small hills that is designed to be used by people on mountain bikes (= bicycles with thick tyres originally designed to be ridden on hills and rough ground ), skateboards (= narrow flat boards with wheels underneath), etc. :
examples: Pump tracks can be ridden using a bike, scooter, skateboard and even wheelchairs.
Pump tracks are designed to maximize your momentum, so you can ride it with minimal pedalling.
